APPLY NOW WELL EQUIPPED LABORATORY APPLY NOW EQUIPPED ICT LABORATORY APPLY NOW RICO SPORTIFIED APPLY NOW Conducive LEARNING Environment

Choose The RICO
Experience

It is with delight that we welcome you to Royalpalm International College (RICO). RICO is a co-educational Day/Boarding elite College situated in the tranquil city of Ilorin, the capital of Kwara State in North Central Nigeria.

Find Out More!

2025

THE BEST UTME RESULTS IN THE HISTORY OF THIS GREAT SCHOOL

2023

WAEC

2023

Class Of 2023

2022

OUR NURSERY/PRIMARY SCHOOL: JAMRAH ACADEMY

2022

RICO ENTREPRENEURSHIP

Life At RICO

Building a vibrant community of creative and accomplished people

Entrepreneurship programme

We believe that education goes beyond what happens in the classroom only, being the reason why we set up an entrepreneurship programme in our school. It is a programme that has been equipping the learners the needed skills to be self-employed, regardless of their profession in the future and even now.

Sport & Games

RoyalPalm International College believes that physical exercise promotes healthy living and mental alertness, this is why sporting activities are made compulsory for every child in the school. Every student is encouraged to participate in at least one sport, and trainers/coaches are always on ground to guide and to train them.

Hostel Activities

RICO is a residential institution with a regular day-school educational system. Therefore special and individual attention is given to the boarders for the remaining part of the day. All the boys and girls are involved in variety of cognitive and co native activities for a holistic development.

Upcoming Events

30
Oct
Day Students Resume
29
Oct
Boarding Students Resume
SEE ALL EVENTS

The RoyalPalm Experience

Effective Education, Assured Future. Finally the Best Co-Educational School is here

Why Choose Us?

A choice that makes the difference.

Our Curriculum

Our curriculum and programs are differentiated based on students' needs. Our supportive learning environment enhances each unique student’s skill set by guiding them through hands-on academic activities. Our Learning Support Team provides each student with opportunity to grow in areas of strength and provide hands on engagement and learning so all students can reach their full potential.

Our Teachers

All of our highly trained teachers possess many years of educational experience paired with a passion for growing and nurturing our students. Though the teachers lead the way, we also foster self-motivation, critical thinking, and accountability in our students. Our small class sizes deliver a very personalized and engaging learning experience where every student is valued and recognized.

Experienced Leadership

Leading a large, busy school such as Royal Palm International College and sustaining and building on its high levels of success is a huge responsibility. It relies upon a passionate and dedicated team of senior staff with vision who are driven by a commitment to develop students academically, physically, socially and spiritually.

Collaborative Approach

Royal Palm International College's collaborative approach gives students the opportunity to play an active role in their education and take ownership of their futures. At all ages, students balance engaging independent study with stimulating group work and team collaboration.

Expanding Horizons

The academy is committed to the all-round development of your child’s talents and interests. The extra-curricular programs vary and exciting, challenging and stretching, allowing children the chance to gain new experiences or deepen existing skills outside the four walls of the classroom.

Real World Application

Real-world application is critical. Our programs are developed not only to promote student success in the classroom, but far beyond it and for years to come. Henderson International students are equipped with life tools. Students are confident, inspired and prepared.

STUDENT LIFE

ACADEMICS

From the moment you set foot on campus, you will be immersed in a creative community of legendary teachers, mentors, and students with a range of passions and interests who are ready to collaborate. Find a new home in a diverse and vibrant collective of artists, scholars, activists, and innovators.

TALENT DEVELOPMENT

Our Talent Development Programme is concerned with developing skills and promoting attitudes that contribute to our students’ well-being. This encompasses emotional, cognitive, physical, spiritual and social health and development
APPLY FOR ADMISSION!

ONLINE COMMUNITY

Outstanding Alumni

Become a Success Story. Join our community of students impacting the world.

Adekanye Ameera
Ex- Student
"Walking through the doors of Royalpalm International College was one of the non-regretable decisions I made, because I mean why would I regret being privileged to pass through one of the most prestigious schools in Kwara state. My experience through...
Shittu Ahmed
Head Boy (Ex- Student)
"It has been a wonderful journey so far. I would like to congratulate the Class of 2021/2022 and everyone who was a part of this journey. It was an honour to have served this great college as the Head Boy....
Saliu Jameela
Head Girl(ex- Student)
"My journey at RICO was filled with ups and downs but I if I have to do it all over again, I will still choose this great citadel of learning. I feel honoured and blessed to have attended this institution....
Jimoh Nana-Hauwa
Ex-Student
"In RICO, I did not only find friends and opportunities, neither did I only get educated and motivated ,I also found a family,a family that truly accepted me for who I am and who I plan to be. Several times...
Olanrewaju Sherif
Ex-Student
"My name is Olanrewaju Sherif Bidemi, and I am now a student at the ICT University of Yaoude in Cameroon. I graduated from ROYALPALM INTERNATIONAL COLLEGE in the class of 2021. My time at ROYALPALM INTERNATIONAL COLLEGE was really great...

Trusted by over 1000+ students

Join our community of successful Students

APPLY NOW!
